title: Louis Calebout
text: Louis Calebout (27 July 1928 – 30 August 2010) was a Belgian <a href="boxing">boxer</a>. He competed in the <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%201948%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Bantamweight">men's bantamweight</a> event at the <a href="1948%20Summer%20Olympics">1948 Summer Olympics</a>. At the 1948 Summer Olympics, he lost to <a href="Juan%20Venegas">Juan Venegas</a> of Puerto Rico.
